arts.ttl: Man Utd news: Cristiano Ronaldo tipped for stunning return after brutal Ruben Amorim dig
arts.sum: Manchester United have dropped to 15th in the Premier League after suffering a 12th defeat of the season against Spurs, heaping more pressure on Ruben Amorim as he battles to overhaul his struggling side

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim told he should turn to Cristiano Ronaldo to solve Man Utd goalscoring woes
arts.sum: Former Manchester United striker Teddy Sheringham believes Cristiano Ronaldo could help current strikers Rasmus Hojlund and Joshua Zirkzee improve by coaching them

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo already made his thoughts clear on Jude Bellingham's F-bomb red card
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham was sent off for Real Madrid after the referee believed the midfielder had insulted him, but Cristiano Ronaldo understood how to deal with La Liga officials

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo's ominous warning about Spanish referees resurfaces after Jude Bellingham's red card for Real Madrid over 'f*** off' outburst
arts.sum: England star Bellingham was sent off by referee Jose Luis Munuera Montero 39 minutes into Madrid 1-1 draw at Osasuna for foul and abusive language.

arts.ttl: Jhon Duran finds unique way to describe playing with Cristiano Ronaldo in Saudi Arabia
arts.sum: Jhon Duran has made an instant impact at Al Nassr, scoring four goals in his opening two Saudi Pro League appearances, and he has been left pinching himself by sharing the pitch with Cristiano Ronaldo

arts.ttl: Arne Slot compares Mo Salah to Cristiano Ronaldo as he notices obvious similarity
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot has heaped praise on Mo Salah and compared him to Cristiano Ronaldo, as well as singling out the role of the Egyptian star's team-mate Virgil van Dijk

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo's diet – Everything he eats, what meals are like, banned foods and secrets
arts.sum: A lot of thought goes into now 40-year-old Cristiano Ronaldo's diet, including the foods and drinks the Manchester United icon swears by – and the ones he won't touch
